Description: Unique identifier assigned to each employee (e.g., E0042).
Department the employee belongs to (e.g., Retail Banking, Compliance).
Hierarchical level of the employee (e.g., Associate, Manager, VP).
Unique ID for the training module (e.g., M17).
Title or name of the training module (e.g., Module 17).
Format of the module (e.g., Video, Quiz, Article, Webinar).
Date when the employee started the module.
Date of completion (if completed); blank if incomplete or dropped.
Whether the module was Completed, Incomplete, or Dropped.
Score obtained (out of 100), applicable mostly to quizzes.
Employeeâ€™s feedback rating for the module (1 to 5 scale).
Total time spent on the module (in minutes).
Detected or self-reported learning preference (e.g., Visual, Auditory).
Last recorded login date to the learning system.
